Title: Eulogy
Writer: Charise Castro Smith, Mike Flanagan (created by), Shirley Jackson (based on the novel by)
Actors: Michiel Huisman, Carla Gugino, Henry Thomas, Elizabeth Reaser
Plot: As the Crains gather to say their final goodbyes, a flashback reveals Mr. Dudley's connection to the house -- and exposes a secret in the walls.
